property.Oracle RAC: Multiple instances can have different values.

section:
RESUMABLE_TIMEOUT enables or disables resumable statements and specifies resumable timeout at the system level.

See Also:

Oracle Database Administrator's Guide for more information about enabling resumable space allocation, what conditions are correctable, and what statements can be made resumable
seealso: Oracle Database Administrator's Guide for more information about enabling resumable space allocation, what conditions are correctable, and what statements can be made resumable
